title: The Best Years of Our Lives
linkMeta: William Wyler (dir.), Myrna Loy, Dana Andrews
summarytext: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazi Germans.

title: Swades: We, the People
linkMeta: Ashutosh Gowariker (dir.), Shah Rukh Khan, Gayatri Joshi
summarytext: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.
